snippet.title: Arcade Longplay [418] Hard Hat
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Roja Calor

An early game from Exidy where you try to arrange a series of letters into place in each level. All levels spell out EXIDY HARDHAT SUCCESS IS DUE TO YOU PLAYERS. After the word PLAYERS, the game starts over. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
